name: Nell's Night
description:
Nell is a college hermit with all of the worst qualities.

Social anxiety. Overanalyzing. Agoraphobia... The list goes on.

She'd rather do homework than hang out with friends.

She never goes out.

But tonight, she does.

A WIP Ren'Py game made for Yuri Game Jam 2016!

Note: This game is not finished! But it will be eventually... ;oE
